amendment.description: To establish a program to apportion funds to States for use in the acceleration and completion of coordinated planning, design, and construction of internationally significant highway projects.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2615 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2615 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1229-1232; text: CR S1230) To establish a program to apportion funds to States for use in the acceleration and completion of coordinated planning, design, and construction of internationally significant highway projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2615 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 2285.
